post: Best buffet in the city centre?

comment.body: What type of buffet? There's Wing's World Cuisine near The Church and Nando's by Mary St.
one at the top of stephens green shopping centre?
Any buffet would do me, although I do really like a Chinese. What's the best in your opinion?
Dyk what kind of buffet it is?

I actually don't know any, it's been a long time since I last went to one. I heard good things about Wing's, they have a bit of every cuisine.

Fortune Terrace is a Chinese buffet in O'Connell St.

The Mongolian Barbeque in Temple bar is another classic that does all you can eat, a classic!
